meanings.definition: A tropical climbing plant with medicinal properties.
meanings.sent1: The pareira vine is used in traditional medicine for its healing properties.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful pareira plant climbing up the tree in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The pareira plant decided to start a band with the other vines in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like a pareira vine, climbing steadily towards the sun.
meanings.sent5: The pareira plant's leaves shimmered in the sunlight, a sign of its healing powers.

meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the Menispermaceae family.
meanings.sent1: The pareira genus includes many different types of plants with unique characteristics.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the pareira family to understand its biodiversity.
meanings.sent3: The pareira plants in the garden had a family reunion to celebrate their genetic connection.
meanings.sent4: The pareira genus stood out in the botanical world like a rare gem.
meanings.sent5: Each pareira plant in the Menispermaceae family had its own story to tell.
